title: Dataset _getittem_ Iterator
body_html:
Hello,

I was wondering Dataset could support in some way an iterator.

I need to generate from x (image), N image with a part masked in a sliding window way.
I cant't do it with the current format, or I need to externalize it and
convert tensor -> numpy (modify it) -> tensor.

Best.

body:
Hello,

I was wondering Dataset could support in some way an iterator.

I need to generate from x (image), N image with a part masked in a sliding window way.
I cant't do it with the current format, or I need to externalize it and 
convert tensor -> numpy (modify it) -> tensor.

Best.
